channel.title: Marlshal > Ashassasin
channel.description:
[color = purple] Marlshal [/color] - [color = purple] Unseen Investigative [/color]
Passive 1: Has Special Mod Powers + Automatically knows everyone’s class before the game starts.
Passive 2: Best Rated (https://forum.imperium42.com/t/mods-ranked-i-guess/62629/16) - Is better than Ashe. You can’t kill, occupy or redirect the best mod so don’t try. Bypasses prince execute and reaper gather darkness + reap.
Passive 3 : Evil Moderator - Uses abuse to get 3 passive, to get 3 night abilities and to get 3 day abilities. Additionally he is able to use 1 or more abilities at the same time due to his mod powers.
Day Ability 1: Expert Deducer - Deduces a person with his gamebreaking mod hacks and publicly embarrassing their class to the whole court (infinite uses)
Day Ability 2 - Rig the Game - Automaticalky forcé execute a chosen class, the player will flip as been voted ending the day with this vote. (Causes Majority to be reached 1 use)
Day Ability 3 - Marlkill - Publicly modkilll a player because of breaking the code of Marl laws. This bypasses death immunity. (Infinite uses)
Night Ability 1: Break the Game - Kill someone bypasses night immunity and prevention. This is jail and merc guard. (Infinite uses)
Night Ability 2: Redirect someone to someone but they will not know they were redirected bypasses redirect immunity and prevention because of mod status. (Infinite uses)
Night Ability 3: Occupy a player and all its visitor tonight bypasses occupy immune classes and prevention.
Vive la Revolution!!
@Marluxion @Ashe @Firelitten thoughts?

item.title: Marlshal > Ashassasin

Riot so one of you are determined better than the other!

item.title: Marlshal > Ashassasin

item.description:
I’m not siding with Marl or Ashe here.
They’re both great. So neither of them is better than the other…

item.title: Marlshal > Ashassasin
item.dc:creator: Sam17z
item.description:
Marlshal

Unseen Investigative

Passive 1: Has Special Mod Powers + Automatically knows everyone’s class before the game starts.

Passive 2: Best Rated (https://forum.imperium42.com/t/mods-ranked-i-guess/62629/16) - Is better than Ashe. You can’t kill, occupy or redirect the best mod so don’t try. Bypasses prince execute and reaper gather darkness + reap.

Passive 3 : Evil Moderator - Uses abuse to get 3 passive, to get 3 night abilities and to get 3 day abilities. Additionally he is able to use 1 or more abilities at the same time due to his mod powers.

Day Ability 1: Expert Deducer - Deduces a person with his gamebreaking mod hacks and publicly embarrassing their class to the whole court (infinite uses)

Day Ability 2 - Rig the Game - Automaticalky forcé execute a chosen class, the player will flip as been voted ending the day with this vote. (Causes Majority to be reached 1 use)

Day Ability 3 - Marlkill - Publicly modkilll a player because of breaking the code of Marl laws. This bypasses death immunity. (Infinite uses)

Night Ability 1: Break the Game - Kill someone bypasses night immunity and prevention. This is jail and merc guard. (Infinite uses)

Night Ability 2: Redirect someone to someone but they will not know they were redirected bypasses redirect immunity and prevention because of mod status. (Infinite uses)

Night Ability 3: Occupy a player and all its visitor tonight bypasses occupy immune classes and prevention.

Vive la Revolution!!

@Marluxion @Ashe @Firelitten thoughts?

Read full topic
